title: Global death toll from COVID-19 tops 5 million, as parents in the U.S. await next moves on vaccines for children
text:
Dow clings to gain after briefly topping 36,000 as investors await this week's Fed meeting

U.S. stocks trade mixed Monday morning after major indexes push to a round of intraday records, with investors awaiting this week's pivotal Federal Reserve meeting. See full story.

Exxon Mobil as COP26 play? Here's why Morgan Stanley says some of the dirtiest companies will benefit from decarbonization.

To look for next-generation technologies, look to some of the old ones, a leading brokerage says. See full story.

I've been working for my millionaire friend for 4 years — she's never given me a pay raise. My husband says I should be grateful

‘I don't want to ruin this friendship, but I also don't want to be a sucker.' See full story.

Arby's new sandwich goes toe-to-toe with a cult classic: McDonald's McRib

Arby's latest offering is a country-style rib sandwich that promises smoky authenticity. Does it deliver? See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

'His wife has no idea about this.' See full story.
